name: Luigi’s Mansion™: Dark Moon Trailer
description: This action-filled follow-up to the original Luigi’s Mansion for Nintendo GameCube launches for Nintendo 3DS this holiday. Players can expect more haunted mansions to explore and new ways for Luigi to take on a wild assortment of ghosts in this new adventure. In addition to using the strobe function of his flashlight to stun ghosts, Luigi must solve various puzzles and reveal hidden details in the environment to unlock new areas in the mansions.
